SELECT m.*,b.*, (b_hit/b_bat) b_avg, NVL((b_er*9) / DECODE(b_ip, 0, NULL, b_ip), 0) b_era FROM G_MEMBER M, (SELECT id,sum(b_bat) b_bat,sum(b_hit) b_hit,sum(b_rbi) b_rbi,sum(b_score) b_score, sum(b_win) b_win, sum(b_lose) b_lose, sum(b_strike) b_strike, sum(b_ip) b_ip, sum(b_er) b_er FROM g_baseball GROUP BY ROLLUP(id)) B
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_bat DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_hit DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_rbi DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_score DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_avg DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_win DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_lose DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_strike DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_ip DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_er DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_era DESC

SELECT * FROM G_MEMBER M, (SELECT id,sum(b_3point) AS b_3point,sum(b_assist) b_assist,sum(b_steel) b_steel,sum(b_score) b_score,sum(b_block) b_block,sum(b_rebound) b_rebound FROM g_basketball GROUP BY ROLLUP(id)) B
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_3point DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_assist DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_steel DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_score DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_block DESC
M.ID=B.ID ORDER BY b_rebound DESC

SELECT * FROM G_MEMBER M, (SELECT id,sum(f_goal) AS f_goal,sum(f_assist) f_assist,sum(f_shoot) f_shoot,sum(f_attack) f_attack FROM g_football GROUP BY ROLLUP(id)) F
M.ID=F.ID ORDER BY f_goal DESC
M.ID=F.ID ORDER BY f_assist DESC
M.ID=F.ID ORDER BY f_shoot DESC
M.ID=F.ID ORDER BY f_attack DESC
